mapper.insert: INSERT INTO socket(combination,account,cover,content,situation) VALUES (#{combination,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{account,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{cover,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{situation,jdbcType = INTEGER})
mapper.select: SELECT a.*, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `socket` ss WHERE ss.cover = #{account,jdbcType = VARCHAR} AND ss.situation = 1 AND ss.combination = a.combination) 'count' FROM (SELECT combination,s.start_time startTime,s.account,s.cover,s.content,(SELECT u.name FROM `user` u WHERE u.account = s.account ) name, (SELECT u.name FROM `user` u WHERE u.account = s.cover) coverName FROM `socket` s WHERE account = #{account,jdbcType = VARCHAR} OR cover = #{account,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ORDER BY start_time DESC) a GROUP BY a.combination
